summary: SummaryMAC Lipglass High Shine Lip Gloss is an ultra-shiny, hydrating and versatile lip gloss in a wide range of gloss tints from nearly clear to high-drama red that can create a high-gloss ,glass-like finish or a subtle sheen. Use alone or over lipstick to create your ultimate lip look that lasts.
details: DetailsBenefitsFormulated to create an unmatched mega shineCan bring on a high-gloss shine or just a subtle touch of sheen.Wear Lipglass High Shine Lip Gloss on its own, over lip pencil or your favorite lipstick.Available in a wide variety of high shine pigmented colors--from nude to pink to Ruby Woo red.FeaturesFormulated with Jojoba oil to help soften, smooth and condition lips.Formulated WithoutFragranceOilFormaldehydeHydroquinoneTriclosanCoal TarTolueneItem 2510613How To UsePrep lips with Prep + Prime Lip Primer before applying lipglass lip gloss.Apply lip gloss using the doe-foot applicator.For fuller-looking lips, concentrate Lipglass Lip Gloss in the center of lips.Apply on top of lipstick to add a high-shine effect with intense color.IngredientsHydrogenated Polyisobutene, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Octyldodecanol, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax / Copernicia Cerifera Cera / Cire De Carnauba, Tocopheryl Acetate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Orbignya Oleifera (Babassu) Seed Oil, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Acrylates Copolymer, Alumina, Aluminum Calcium Sodium Silicate, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Silica, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Tin Oxide, Polyethylene Terephthalate, Propylene Carbonate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Ethylhexyl Hydroxystearate, Vanillin, Phenoxyethanol. May Contain: Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Bronze Powder (CI 77400), Carmine (CI 75470), Copper Powder (CI 77400), Red 6 (CI 15850), Red 6 Lake (CI 15850), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Red 21 Lake (CI 45380), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Red 30 Lake (CI 73360), Red 33 Lake (CI 17200), Yellow 5 (CI 19140), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985).Please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Prep lips with Prep + Prime Lip Primer before applying lipglass lip gloss.Apply lip gloss using the doe-foot applicator.For fuller-looking lips, concentrate Lipglass Lip Gloss in the center of lips.Apply on top of lipstick to add a high-shine effect with intense color.
ingredients: Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax / Copernicia Cerifera Cera / Cire De Carnauba

reviews.headline: Great product!
reviews.comments: Product works well. Looks great!

reviews.headline: Love this product!
reviews.comments: One of my favs along with Oh Baby! Will continue to use!

reviews.headline: I would definitely purchase it again
reviews.comments: The color is perfect for me and it feels so nice on my lips. I received so many comments from my friends and strangers!

reviews.headline: Gorgeous Color, Highly Pigmented & Smooth Like Butter
reviews.comments: I absolutely love MAC's Lipglass‚Äîclear and colored ones! I wear lipliner daily and often have to add a lipstick on top before adding my gloss. With these, I don't have to! The color payoff is stunning and I get to skip the lipstick step. 10/10!

reviews.headline: The definition of perfection
reviews.comments: I have almost all of these shades but let me tell you about my favorite one. Lovechild. What a perfect color. Mid-tone pink with cool plum undertone and a pearly shimmer. It looks perfect with either plum or stone lipliner. I highly recommend it. Simply perfect!

reviews.headline: Lovely Color, but Very Sticky
reviews.comments:
I love that this came in a good pale nude color. Most lip makeup products are too dark for my preference. 
I'm really disappointed with how sticky the formula is though. It's unpleasant wearing even the thinnest amount.

reviews.headline: I always buy this!
reviews.comments: Great product!

reviews.headline: Nice color, but sticky
reviews.comments: Nice color, but very sticky, shining looks like a natural color. I wish it would be made from natural ingredients.

reviews.headline: A true classic
reviews.comments: I have a love/hate with lipgloss. I love the idea but hate the fact gloss wears off so fast and can be sticky. Yes this is Mac lipgloss is a bit tacky but the color payoff on Ruby Woo and Love Child is just incredible. Definitely longer lasting than traditional lipgloss.

reviews.headline: Looks like early 2000s gloss
reviews.comments: Not sticky at all, looks very cute üòç

reviews.headline: Love Child is a must!
reviews.comments: I've used this shade for literally 25 yrs!!! I have several on hand for fear of it being  discontinued..lol. it simply elevates your look. It looks great on every person that has tried mine, or purchased it themselves, no matter their skin tone!

reviews.headline: Must have
reviews.comments: A good basic gloss to have in my purse. Combined with a lipliner it looks even better!

reviews.headline: too sticky
reviews.comments: I was not a fan of the feel of this lip gloss. Too sticky for me.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Picked up the shade "bittersweet me" on a whim during the most recent MAC sale. The shade is a gorgeous brown, almost complementary nude on my darker skin. Feels comfortable on the lips. Will definitely try more shades

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: It a lasting lovely color

reviews.headline: Love this. Tried and true
reviews.comments: Original is the best.  Yes "sticky". YES it stays put.

reviews.headline: My FAV!!!
reviews.comments: My favorite color!!!

reviews.headline: Shinny
reviews.comments: Color is a perfect red and goes on softly.

reviews.headline: Old School Formula, Disappointed
reviews.comments: I was looking for a nude slightly lighter than my lips. Specifically, I wanted a color dupe for Buxom's White Russian in a more modern gloss formula (slippier and more hydrating). C-Thru looked great in store, but I might as well have gotten White Russian because the formula is thick, sticky, and very 2016--same as Buxom's. Because it has so much thickness, it's long lasting. But you very much don't want to overapply or you'll get *the white ring* (you know what I'm taking about) and the strings that look like stalactites when you open your mouth. Shudder. No sensation--like, tingling--and it smells like vanilla. It's probably good for some people. Different strokes. I'll use this, but it's absolutely a disappointment for me

reviews.headline: Mehhh
reviews.comments: Product is pretty sticky and the color is very sheer

faceoff_positive.comments: I have a couple in this shade, and I do love the shade. Its a pretty pink with gold tones and flecks. It works great as a topper to add dimension and highlight to your lip look. The new formulation is a bit stickier than the old, fyi. I was super bummed that they totally discontinued my all time fav color, "Wanderlust". I use to buy them six at a time. **Remember to not throw away you empty MAC containers**. Even if you got it at Ulta or somewhere else, you can take SIX empties to any MAC counter/store and get ONE free lipstick, or shadow (at store, lipstick at counter- no shadow).
faceoff_positive.headline: Nymphette

faceoff_negative.comments: As a loyal 15+ year wearer of MAC Prrr I am totally disappointed in the recent lip glass packaging change. MAC has always encouraged recycling of their containers so it baffles me as to why they would repackage their lip glass product in a plastic container that has at least 1/3 more plastic and 40% less product. I'm going to look for a replacement.
faceoff_negative.headline: Big disappointment. After 15 years I'm on to something new.
